title: TaTaTu, AMBI media, Santa Fe films to finance 'The sound of freedom'
content: The blockchain platform TaTaTu along with AMBI media and Santa Fe films will finance the movie 'The sound of Freedom'.As quoted by The Hollywood Reporter, Verastegui chose to make The Sound of Freedom "to inspire people to become the heroes that this world needs ... art has the power. Let's make this world a better place; let's save children that are in captivity."It is a feature film telling the true story of Homeland Security agent Tim Ballard's effort to rescue kidnapped children.The flick stars Jim Caviezel, Mira Sorvino along with Eduardo Verastegui, the CEO of Santa Fe Films who is also the producer.TaTaTu and AMBI media founded by Andrea Iervolino have previously come together to co-finance a biopic of legendary car maker Ferruccio Lamborghini starring Antonio Banderas and Alec Baldwin.
